    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Describing people</string>
            <string language="en">Describing people</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreiben der Leute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrire des personnes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrevendo povos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione della gente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή των ανθρώπων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la descripció física de personatges.
Conté activitats d'identificació, comprensió lectora i exemplificacions de com fer descripcions físiques de persones.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the physical description of people. It includes exercises on identifying, reading comprehension and examples on how to describe people physically.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">personatge</string>
            <string language="en">character</string>
            <string language="es">personaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió lectora</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf der körperlichen Beschreibung der Leute. Sie 
schließt Übungen auf dem Kennzeichnen ein und liest Erfassen und 
Beispiele auf, wie man Leute physikalisch beschreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
la description physique des personnes. Elle inclut des exercices
sur identifier, lisant la compréhension et les exemples sur la façon
dont décrire des personnes physiquement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) na 
descrição física dos povos. Inclui exercícios em 
identificar, lendo a compreensão e os exemplos em como descrever 
fisicamente povos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sulla
descrizione fisica della gente. Include le esercitazioni 
sull'identificare, leggendo la comprensione e gli esempi su come 
descrivere fisicamente la gente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη φυσική 
περιγραφή των ανθρώπων. Περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις στον 
προσδιορισμό, διαβάζοντας την κατανόηση και τα παραδείγματα στο 
πώς να περιγράψει τους ανθρώπους φυσικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">caractère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
